name: chrome-extension-bingeflix
excerpt: Enhance your Netflix binge-watching with BingeFlix, a Chrome extension that lets you skip intros and seamlessly move to the next episode for uninterrupted viewing pleasure.
description: BingeFlix is a Google Chrome extension designed to automatically press the 'Skip Intro' and 'Next Episode' buttons which appear whilst watching Netflix, allowing you to binge-watch uninterupted. Additionally, it has a simple settings menu, where you can control which buttons the plugin should automatically press.
